name: soundcloud_scrape_track
description: Scrape full track details from a SoundCloud track page. Returns title, artist, play count, like count, repost count, comment count, description, genre, tags, and waveform.

steps.code: const titleEl = document.querySelector('.soundTitle__title span, h1 span, [class*="listenDetails"] h1'); const artistEl = document.querySelector('.soundTitle__username, a[class*="soundTitle__username"], [class*="listenDetails"] a'); const playsEl = document.querySelector('[class*="playbackCount"], [title*="plays"], [class*="listenCount"]'); const likesEl = document.querySelector('[class*="likeCount"], button[class*="like"] span'); const repostsEl = document.querySelector('[class*="repostCount"], button[class*="repost"] span'); const commentsCountEl = document.querySelector('[class*="commentCount"], [class*="comment"] span'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="truncatedAudioInfo__content"], [class*="description"]'); const genreEl = document.querySelector('[class*="genre"], a[href*="/tags/"]'); const dateEl = document.querySelector('time, [class*="relativeTime"], [class*="uploadTime"]'); const imgEl = document.querySelector('.image__full, .sc-artwork img, span[style*="background-image"]'); const tagEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/tags/"], [class*="soundTagList"] a'); const tags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 50 && !tags.includes(t)) tags.push(t); }); let imgSrc = ''; if (imgEl) { imgSrc = imgEl.getAttribute('src') || ''; if (!imgSrc) { const style = imgEl.getAttribute('style') || ''; const match = style.match(/url\(["']?([^"')]+)/); if (match) imgSrc = match[1]; } } return { title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: artistEl ? artistEl.textContent.trim() : '', plays: playsEl ? playsEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', reposts: repostsEl ? repostsEl.textContent.trim() : '', comments: commentsCountEl ? commentsCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 1000) : '', genre: genreEl ? genreEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', tags: tags.slice(0, 10), image: imgSrc, url: window.location.href }
